item.title: Bando di ammissione al corso di PhD in Neuroscienze Cognitive / Selection for the admission to the Cognitive Neuroscience PhD course
item.description:
Responsabile del Corso / Head of PhD course: Prof. Mathew E. Diamond

From: 05-02-2025 13:00
To: 20-03-2025 13:00
Category: Dottorati

Bando di ammissione al corso di PhD in Neuroscienze Cognitive/ Selection for the admission to the Cognitive Neuroscience PhD course -


Topics:


  •  Main topics in cognitive neuroscience

  • Neuronal bases of Visual perception

  • Neuronal bases of Time perception

  • Neuronal bases of Tactile perception

  • Language, reading, and statistical learning

  • Neural computation approaches to memory and brain organization

  • Computational bases of perception and cognition

Durata / Duration: 4 anni / 4 years


Modalità di selezione  / Selection Process:  Titoli  - scritto - orale / Academic qualifications - written - oral (11.04 - 12.04.2019)

item.title: Bando di ammissione al corso di PhD in Genomica Funzionale e Strutturale Selection for the admission to the Functional and Structural Genomics PhD course

Avviso di selezione ad evidenza pubblica per l'ammissione ai Corsi di Dottorato di ricerca  XXXV ciclo - 2019 -


Topics:






..


Durata / Duration: 4 anni / 4 years


Modalità di selezione  / Selection Process:  Titoli  - scritto - orale / Academic qualifications - written - oral (11.04 - 12.04.2019)

item.title: Bando di ammissione al corso di PhD in Biofisica Statistica e Molecolare Selection for the admission to the Molecular and Statistical Biophysics PhD course
item.description:
Responsabile del Corso / Head of PhD course: Prof. Cristian Micheletti

From: 16-12-2024 13:00
To: 28-04-2025 13:00
Category: Dottorati

Topics:


• Statistical mechanics of complex molecular systems

• Activity-driven biological processes

• Stochastic processes and biological noise

• Biomolecular simulations

• Simulations of rare events

• Soft Matter Physics

• Quantum Computing for Soft Materials


Durata / Duration: 4 anni / 4 years


Modalità di selezione  / Selection Process:  Titoli  - scritto - orale (da remoto) Academic qualifications - written - interview (remotely) (12.05 - 13.05.2024)

item.title: Bando di ammissione al corso di PhD in Neurobiologia / Selection for the admission to the Neurobiology PhD course
item.description:
Responsabile del Corso / Head of PhD course: Prof. Paul Heppenstall

From: 05-02-2025 13:00
To: 13-03-2025 13:00
Category: Dottorati

Topics:


  • Peripheral Nervous System

  • Pain, touch and itch

  • Synaptic Neurophysiology and Neuronal Networks

  • Cell excitability and cortical information processing

  • Optogenetic and electrophysiological approaches to Neuronal Networks

  • Computational Neuroscience and Modelling

  • Neurotoxicity and calcium signaling

  • New Materials and Neurons

  • Neurophysiology of Motor control

  • Spinal networks patho-physiology and locomotion

  • Interfaces to simultaneously stimulate and record signals from the spinal cord

  • Respiratory physiology

  • Neurophysiology and neuropharmacology of spinal motoneurons

  • Olfactory and taste dysfunctions in COVID-19

  • Visual systems and feature detection

  • Simultaneous acquisition of neural activity and behavior

  • Innate behaviors and their underlying circuits

  • Functional imaging approaches to neural circuits

  • Neuroecology

Durata / Duration: 4 anni / 4 years


Modalità di selezione  / Selection Process:  Titoli  - scritto - orale (da remoto) / Academic qualifications - written - interview (remotely) ( 15.04 - 16.04.2025)

item.title: Selection for the admission to the Theoretical and Scientific Data Science PhD course - 2 Fellowships financed by Human Technopole Foundation
item.description:
Responsabile del Corso / Head of PhD course: Prof. Roberto Trotta

From: 27-02-2025 13:00
To: 23-05-2025 13:00
Category: Dottorati

Selection for the admission to the Theoretical and Scientific Data Science PhD course - 2 Fellowships financed by Human Technopole Foundation - phd-tsds-HT-2025


Topics:


- Artificial Intelligence methods for spatial cancer biology

- Decoding Oncogenic Shock: Advanced Unsupervised Learning for Causal Pathway Reconstruction in Cancer


Durata / Duration: 4 anni / 4 years


Modalità di selezione  / Selection Process:  Titoli  - scritto - orale (da remoto) / Academic qualifications - written - interview (remotely) (03.06 - 04/06.06.2025)
